mapper.select: SELECT abn.box_cd, abn.box_num, abn.user_id, abn.box_flag, abn.rent_seq, abr.rent_memo, DATE_FORMAT(ABR.RENT_START, "%Y-%m-%d") rent_start, DATE_FORMAT(ABR.RENT_END , "%Y-%m-%d") rent_end, abr.deposit, abr.deposit_yn, abr.order_no, abr.extend_yn, abr.key_yn, abr.rent_type FROM ACM_BOX AB, ACM_BOX_NUM ABN, ACM_BOX_RENT ABR WHERE AB.BOX_CD = ABN.BOX_CD AND AB.BOX_CD = ABR.BOX_CD AND ABN.BOX_NUM = ABR.BOX_NUM and abr.USER_ID = #{userId}
